title: Assets are not rendered in appearance settings
body:
Assets are not rendered in appearance settings. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33099791/161792064-95224bf9-3e97-4c5f-991f-f3b64f85cab1.png)

---

**Probably in other places as well, please follow output warnings.**
